name: ٱلْرَّحْمَـانُ
benefits: Reciting it 100 times after every obligatory prayer will enhance memory and awareness. The reciter will feel the burden vanishing away from his heart.

name: ٱلْرَّحِيْمُ
benefits: Reciting it after Fajr prayer 100 times will keep the person safe from all tribulation. Moreover, he will find everyone benevolent towards him.

name: ٱلْمَلِكُ
meaning: The King and Owner of Dominion
benefits: Recitation of this name after Fajr prayer will make a person become rich.

name: ٱلْقُدُّوسُ
benefits: Agitation never comes close if someone recites it 100 times every day.

name: ٱلْسَّلَامُ
meaning: The Perfection and Giver of Peace
benefits: The sick will regain his health if this is recited to him 160 times. It also keeps the frequent reciter, of this name, safe from all types of tribulations.

name: ٱلْمُؤْمِنُ
meaning: The One Who gives Emaan and Security
benefits: Reciting it 631 times will keep you safe from anguish.

name: ٱلْمُهَيْمِنُ
meaning: The Guardian, The Witness, The Overseer
benefits: This purifies the soul of a person, if it is recited 100 times after taking a bath and offering two rakaats of prayer.

name: ٱلْعَزِيزُ
benefits: Recitation of this name 41 times after Fajr prayer will make the person independent from others and will earn respect.

name: ٱلْجَبَّارُ
benefits: Whoever recites this name several times will not be forced to do anything. He will be safe from cruelty and hardship.

name: ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرُ
benefits: The one who recites this name frequently will earn respect and gain success.

name: ٱلْخَالِقُ
benefits: Allah will assign an angel to guide the person righteously if he recites this name 100 times continuously for a prescribed limit of 7 days.

name: ٱلْبَارِئُ
benefits: This name only signifies that Allah created all things in proportion.

name: ٱلْمُصَوِّرُ
benefits: Recite this name 21 times and do a Damm on water. Continue this for 7 consecutive days. Use the water for breaking the fast. Insha’Allah, the women will soon be blessed with a child.

name: ٱلْغَفَّارُ
benefits: Sins of a person will be forgiven if it is recited frequently.

name: ٱلْقَهَّارُ
benefits: This name will provide the person with inner peace and will lead the person to the correct place.

name: ٱلْوَهَّابُ
benefits: Reciting it frequently will remove poverty. Reciting it 40 times in the last Sajadah of Chasht prayer will relieve the person from starvation.

name: ٱلْرَّزَّاقُ
benefits: The person will be provided with livelihood by reciting this name.

name: ٱلْفَتَّاحُ
benefits: The reciter of this name will be given success and victory in every aspect of his life.

name: ٱلْعَلِيمُ
benefits: The heart of reciter will be enlightened with the light of Nur.

name: ٱلْقَابِضُ
benefits: This finishes poverty from the house if it is written, and eaten on 4 pieces of food till 40 days.

name: ٱلْبَاسِطُ
benefits: Repeating this name 10 times after Chasht prayer and rubbing hands with face will no longer be dependent upon others.

name: ٱلْخَافِضُ
benefits: Allah will fulfill the need of the person who recites it 500 times. It also acts as a guard from all enemies if a group of people sit in the gathering on the fourth day of fasting and recite this name 70 times each.

name: ٱلْرَّافِعُ
benefits: The one who recites this name 101 times in day and night will get wealthier and will be highly regarded in merit.

name: ٱلْمُعِزُّ
benefits: Reciting this name 140 times after Maghrib prayer either on Monday or on Friday, Allah will make him majestic in the eyes of other people.

name: ٱلْمُذِلُّ
benefits: Reciting this name 75 times will protect the person from those who wish to harm him.

name: ٱلْسَّمِيعُ
benefits: Allah will fulfill the desire of a person who recites this name 500, 100 or 50 times on Thursday after Chasht prayer.

name: ٱلْبَصِيرُ
benefits: For the enlightenment of heart and soul, recite this name 100 times after Jummah prayer.

name: ٱلْحَكَمُ
meaning: The Judge, The Giver of Justice
benefits: Secrets will be revealed to the person who recites this name frequently at night.

name: ٱلْعَدْلُ
benefits: People will obey you if you will write this name on a piece of bread on Friday.

name: ٱلْلَّطِيفُ
meaning: The Subtle One, The Most Gentle
benefits: To make your affairs get settled accordingly to your will, recite this name 133 times daily.

name: ٱلْخَبِيرُ
benefits: Reciting this name regularly will make a person a righteous man who is indulged in wrong things.

name: ٱلْحَلِيمُ
benefits: Write this name on a piece of paper and wash it with water. Use that water for sprinkling things. This will keep the things safe from all types of damages.

name: ٱلْعَظِيمُ
benefits: To earn respect and honor, recite this name several times.

name: ٱلْغَفُورُ
benefits: This name works as a cure for headache and fever.

name: ٱلْشَّكُورُ
benefits: The person will be relieved from all the suffering if he recites this name 41 times daily.

name: ٱلْعَلِيُّ
benefits: The one who keeps this name written on a piece of paper will achieve a high rank and success in all his work.

name: ٱلْكَبِيرُ
benefits: The reciter of this name 100 times daily will be esteemed by everyone.

name: ٱلْحَفِيظُ
meaning: The Preserver, The All-Heedful and All-Protecting
benefits: Recite this name and do a Damm on water. Give the water to the ill mannered child. He will become obedient.

name: ٱلْمُقِيتُ
benefits: Reciting it many times will keep him safe from problems and difficulties.

name: ٱلْحَسِيبُ
benefits: The one who recites this name 7 times and do a Damm on himself, his property and family will come under the custody of Allah.

name: ٱلْجَلِيلُ
benefits: Repeating this name frequently will help a person attain respect and honor.

name: ٱلْكَرِيمُ
meaning: The Most Generous, The Most Esteemed
benefits: To earn a lot of respect in this world and Hereafter, recite this name many times before going to sleep.

name: ٱلْرَّقِيبُ
benefits: Recite this name seven times and do a Damm on yourself or your family. This will ensure the safety under Allah’s protection.

name: ٱلْمُجِيبُ
benefits: If you want an answer to any of your appeal, then you will get it if you recite this name frequently.

name: ٱلْوَاسِعُ
benefits: Allah opens the doors of income if someone recites this name many times. His difficulties in earning be vanished.

name: ٱلْحَكِيمُ
benefits: This name, when recited, removes difficulties of the work.

name: ٱلْوَدُودُ
benefits: This name helps in resolving a disagreement between two people if one gives the other person food after reciting this name 1000 times in his food.

name: ٱلْمَجِيدُ
benefits: This name bestows a person with glory.

name: ٱلْبَاعِثُ
meaning: The Resurrector, The Raiser of the Dead
benefits: This name makes a person God fearing and therefore, it leads him to the righteous path.

name: ٱلْشَّهِيدُ
benefits: Recite this name 21 times with the hand placed on the head of the disobedient person. Insha’Allah, he will become obedient.

name: ٱلْحَقُّ
benefits: If you lost something, then recite this name.

name: ٱلْوَكِيلُ
meaning: The Trustee, The Disposer of Affairs
benefits: Allah will protect that person from drowning or burning in fire if he recites this name frequently.

name: ٱلْقَوِيُّ
benefits: This keeps a person safe from the harm of the enemy if he is unable to defeat the enemy.

name: ٱلْمَتِينُ
benefits: This helps a person to get rid of all types of troubles.

name: ٱلْوَلِيُّ
benefits: Reciting this name makes the person closer to Allah.

name: ٱلْحَمِيدُ
benefits: The one who recites this name will be praised and loved.

name: ٱلْمُحْصِيُ
benefits: This name provides ease to the person if he is afraid of being questioned on the Day of Resurrection.

name: ٱلْمُبْدِئُ
benefits: A pregnant woman will be safe from danger while aborting if she repeats this name several times.

name: ٱلْمُعِيدُ
benefits: Reciting this name 70 times will bring the person who has left home within 7 days, safe and secure.

name: ٱلْمُحْيِى
benefits: This name reduces the burden of a person if recited 7 times every day.

name: ٱلْمُمِيتُ
meaning: The Bringer of Death, the Destroyer
benefits: This name destroys the enemy completely.

name: ٱلْحَىُّ
benefits: The reciter of this name will have a long life.

name: ٱلْقَيُّومُ
benefits: The one repeats this name will remain active.

name: ٱلْوَاجِدُ
benefits: This name increases the richness of heart.

name: ٱلْمَاجِدُ
benefits: This name enlightens the heart of its reciter.

name: ٱلْوَاحِدُ
benefits: Reciting this name 1000 times in silence alone will vanish the fear from the heart.

name: ٱلْأَحَد
benefits: Secrets will be revealed to the person who recites this name 1000 times.

name: ٱلْصَّمَدُ
benefits: Allah will fulfill all the needs of the person who recites this name many times.

name: ٱلْقَادِرُ
benefits: Allah fulfills all the desires of the person who recites this name often.

name: ٱلْمُقْتَدِرُ
benefits: The reciter will become aware of the truth.

name: ٱلْمُقَدِّمُ
benefits: Reciting this name on the battlefield removes all the fear and keeps the person safe from harm.

name: ٱلْمُؤَخِّرُ
benefits: Reciting this name in the heart for 100 times enriches the person’s heart with the love of Allah. All his world desires will be removed as no other love will ever replace his heart.

name: ٱلأَوَّلُ
benefits: If recited 40 times for 40 days, it will give a child to a family who is not blessed with one. Moreover, a traveler will reach home safe and sound if he recites this name 1000 times on Friday.

name: ٱلْآخِرُ
benefits: The reciter of this name will have a good life and a good death.

name: ٱلْظَّاهِرُ
benefits: The reciter’s heart will be enlightened with Noor (the divine light) if this name is recited 15 times after the Jummah prayer on Friday.

name: ٱلْبَاطِنُ
meaning: The Hidden One, Knower of the Hidden
benefits: With the recitation of this name for only three times every day, he will be able to know the truth in all things.

name: ٱلْوَالِي
benefits: This name keeps the house safe from all dangers.

name: ٱلْمُتَعَالِي
benefits: Whosoever recites this name will become closer to Allah.

name: ٱلْبَرُّ
meaning: The Source of Goodness, the Kind Benefactor
benefits: This name will make the future of the child of reciter free from misfortune.

name: ٱلْتَّوَّابُ
benefits: Supplications are accepted if this name is recited frequently.

name: ٱلْمُنْتَقِمُ
benefits: This helps gain victory against enemies.

name: ٱلْعَفُوُّ
benefits: This name helps a person in the forgiveness of all his sins.

name: ٱلْرَّؤُفُ
benefits: Allah blesses the one who recites this name more often.

name: مَالِكُ ٱلْمُلْكُ
meaning: Master of the Kingdom, Owner of the Dominion
benefits: This name gives respect to its reciter among people.

name: ذُو ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامُ
meaning: Possessor of Glory and Honour, Lord of Majesty and Generosity
benefits: This name removes poverty and makes a person rich.

name: ٱلْمُقْسِطُ
benefits: This name provides protection from the harm of a devil.

name: ٱلْجَامِعُ
benefits: With the power and glory of this name, you will be able to find lost things.

name: ٱلْغَنيُّ
benefits: Reciting this name 70 times will make a person free from all needs.

name: ٱلْمُغْنِيُّ
benefits: Reciting this name 1000 times for ten consecutive Fridays will make a person become self sufficient.

name: ٱلْمَانِعُ
benefits: Recitation of this name 20 times at bedtime provides a happy family life.

name: ٱلْضَّارُ
benefits: This name helps a person in gaining peace if it is read 20 times on Friday nights.

name: ٱلْنَّافِعُ
benefits: This name gives success on every good act if it is started with the recitation of this name for 41 times.

name: ٱلْنُّورُ
benefits: This name enlightens the inside of the person.

name: ٱلْهَادِي
benefits: 1100 times of the recitation of this name makes a person fulfill his needs.

name: ٱلْبَدِيعُ
benefits: To gain relief from any type of distress, a person should recite this name 70,000 times.

name: ٱلْبَاقِي
benefits: To ensure that all your good deeds are accepted, recite this name 100 times on every Friday night.

name: ٱلْوَارِثُ
benefits: A person will remain safe from sorrow and distress if he recites this name 100 times after the sunrise.

name: ٱلْرَّشِيدُ
benefits: To complete a task you are unable to do, recite this name 1000 times between Maghrib and Isha prayer.

name: ٱلْصَّبُورُ
benefits: The person will be rescued from his difficulty if he recites this name 3000 times.
